response.overview: Would you believe that hear isn't hot?  Steel can float in mid-air? And even the most solid substances aren't really solid at all?  In Facts of Faith, you'll watch one million volts of electricity blaze through a man's body.  And witness a whole series of sophisticated scientific experiments all designed to demonstrate some powerful spiritual truths, such as, what faith is and how you can have it.
response.title: Facts of Faith
